CustomField.formula:
IF( Customer_Mistreat_Auto_Fail__c = TRUE, 0,
IF(DATEVALUE( CreatedDate) > DATE(2023,08,25) ,
IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(Client_Greeting__c, "Yes"),ISPICKVAL(Client_Greeting__c, "N/A")),0.05,0)+ IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Customer_Authentication__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL(Customer_Authentication__c, "N/A")),0.1,0)+ IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Language__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL(Language__c, "N/A")),0.05,0)+ IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Jargon__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL(Jargon__c, "N/A")),0.05,0)+ IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Value_Added__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL(Value_Added__c, "N/A")),0.05,0)+ IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Correct_Answer__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL(Correct_Answer__c, "N/A")),0.1,0)+ IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Questioning_Skills__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL(Questioning_Skills__c, "N/A")),0.1,0)+ IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Provided_Accurate_Guidance__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL(Provided_Accurate_Guidance__c, "N/A")),0.1,0)+ IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Successful_Send_Off__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL(Successful_Send_Off__c, "N/A")),0.1,0)+ IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Contact_Handling__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL(Contact_Handling__c, "N/A")),0.1,0)+ IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Asked_for_Review__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL(Asked_for_Review__c, "N/A")),0.05,0)+ IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Related_Records_Linked__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL(Related_Records_Linked__c, "N/A")),0.05,0)+ IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Follow_Up_Provided__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL(Follow_Up_Provided__c, "N/A")),0.05,0)+ IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Comprehensive_Notes_Included__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL(Comprehensive_Notes_Included__c, "N/A")),0.05,0)
,
(Client_Greeting_Score__c + Language_Score__c + Jargon_Score__c + Provided_Accurate_Guidance_Score__c + Successful_Send_Off_Score__c + Contact_Handling_Score__c + Related_Records_Linked_Score__c + Comprehensive_Notes_Included_Score__c + Follow_Up_Provided_Score__c)/100 ))
CustomField.label: Call QA Score
